28047C0D.Line7.804AC: You’re well familiar with our lands, and as brave as those we lost. Could you see them to proper rest?

5A270F87.Line1.804AC: Some of our finest hunters did not return from the hills. Became prey themselves when the fog came with hunger.

6324EF36.VoiceDir3.804AC: Frustrated. Angered by the irreverence of their death.

8E10028B.Line5.804AC: They should be marked with charms of passing. The rites of the Old Ways to see them to peace.

F41B8909.Line3.804AC: Now their bodies lay bare for scavenging. It’s wrong in all ways.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “Is there anything I can help with?”
